column1: Sector 2 (Sectorul 2 in Romanian) is an administrative unit of Bucharest.
Sector 2 is the city's most multicultural sector. In particular
column2: it contains Romania's largest community of Chinese people
column3: who mainly live in the districts of Colentina and Obor.

column1: Air Bucharest has its head office in Sector 2.
The mayor of the sector is Mihai Toader
column2: a member of the Social Democratic Party. He was elected in 2016 for a four-year term. The Local Council of Sector 2 has 27 seats
